articles.title: Croatia’s President Milanović wins reelection after defeating ruling party candidate in runoff - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Croatia's opposition-backed President Zoran Milanović, a critic of the European Union and NATO, overwhelmingly won reelection for another five-year term on Sunday, defeating a candidate from the ruling conservative party in a runoff vote, near-complete offici…
articles.content: ZAGREB, Croatia (AP) Croatia’s opposition-backed President Zoran Milanovi, a critic of the European Union and NATO, overwhelmingly won reelection for another five-year term on Sunday, defeating a can… [+3760 chars]
